intro: Psychotria psathuroides, commonly known as the white psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, white or pale green flowers and elliptical,革质 (leathery) leaves. It often grows in shaded, humid environments such as rainforests. Psychotria psathuroides is also known for its chemical compounds, some of which have been studied for potential medicinal properties.
